text: Beat is a German thriller television series, created and directed by Marco Kreuzpaintner, which was first released on Prime Video on 9 November 2018. After You Are Wanted, it is the second German-language Amazon Original Series. It was awarded a 2019 Grimme-Preis for fiction. On 30 April 2019, it was announced that Beat would not return for a second season. == Cast == * Jannis Niewöhner as Robert "Beat" Schlag * Karoline Herfurth as Emilia * Christian Berkel as Richard Diemer * Alexander Fehling as Philipp Vossberg * Hanno Koffler as Paul * Kostja Ullmann as Jasper Hoff * Nina Gummich as Janine * Ludwig Simon as Janik == References == == External links == * Category:2018 German television series debuts Category:German-language television shows Category:German drama television series Category:Television shows set in Berlin Category:Prime Video original programming Category:Grimme-Preis for fiction winners
title: Beat (TV series)
